name: Hell Walker
description:
My first attempt at both a game jam submission and a rhythm-based game. Enjoy the fast-paced button-mashing action!!

P.S: if you  start seeing the demons, then it's not looking too good for you!

Credits:

  • Roque Romero (https://itch.io/profile/roque-romero) for their demon assets
  • The buttons from Kicked-in-Teeth's UI Button asset (https://kicked-in-teeth.itch.io/button-ui)
  • The main Midi song from Djsedj (https://djsedj.itch.io/naranoiston-albums)
  • Menu song from MakotoHiramatsu (https://makotohiramatsu.itch.io/abandoned)
  • And finally, myself for the development and game design :)
